data.title: Anne Lee Parris Obituary 2012
authors: A.S.Turner & Sons Funeral Home and Crematory

data.meta_site_name: A.S.Turner & Sons Funeral Home and Crematory
data.text:
Mrs. Anne DeLoach Parris, 95, of Decatur, Georgia, passed away Tuesday, November 20, 2012, at her residence. She was preceded in death by her husband, U. S. Army Lt. Col. Tom B. Parris, her daughter, Susie Parris Killion, and her sister, Lora Lee Allums. Survivors are her children and their spouses, Tom and Brenda Parris of Suwanee, Russell and Judy Parris of Atlanta and son-in-law, Steve Killion; six grandchildren; five great grandchildren; sister, Jane Parks of Chattanooga; and three nieces. The family will receive friends from 10:00 a.m. to 11:30 a.m., Saturday, November 24, at A. S. Turner and Sons in Decatur followed by a service at Noon at the graveside at Decatur Cemetery. A. S. Turner and Sons Funeral Home and Crematory.

Funeral Home:

A.S. Turner

2773 N. Decatur Road

Decatur, GA

30033
